sentences.sContent: The committee was dismayed by what it had been told.
sentences.sCn: 该委员会被所告知的情况搞得焦虑不安。

remMethod.val: dis(不) + may(可能) → 不可能做 → 沮丧

words.tran: 吃惊，惊愕；心慌；心中不快
使…灰心；使…害怕（dismay的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the worry, disappoint-ment, or unhappiness you feel when something unpleasant happens
